articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: The transfer window in Scotland will open on a week to day, June 14, but clubs have already been completing deals and making moves to get their squad in place for a pre-season return at the end of the month. What’s been the latest transfer talk...
articles.title: Scottish transfers: 4th Rangers signing near, Celtic duo wanted, £4m price tag for Ibrox star, ex-Hibs ace nears deal

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: The shelving of plans to create a fifth-tier Conference League to accommodate B teams from Celtic, Rangers and Hearts has highlighted the difficulty in satisfying the competing interests of all 270 clubs that make up the country’s pyramid, according to SFA chief executive Ian Maxwell.
articles.title: SFA chief Ian Maxwell makes Celtic and Rangers 'shouldn't be stopped' point as he addresses Conference League collapse

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: SFA chief executive Ian Maxwell has no fears over any approach from Celtic for Scotland manager Steve Clarke as Manchester City assistant Enzo Maresca emerged the frontrunner to replace Ange Postecoglou.
articles.title: Steve Clarke to Celtic given short shrift as SFA chief hails contract timing 'masterstroke'

articles.author: Oliver Anderson
articles.description: Ange Postecoglou will swap one pressure cooker for another after quitting Celtic to become the new manager of Tottenham.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou's 5 big tasks at Tottenham after Celtic departure including Harry Kane future and winning over sceptics

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: The stages of dissociation precipitated by the departure of a beloved manager will now move on to legacy where Celtic and Ange Postecoglou is concerned. The Greek-Australian’s two-year tenure in Glasgow officially ended after his switch to Tottenham Hotspur was confirmed.
articles.title: How Ange Postecoglou could be remembered as Celtic's £130m manager

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Captain Callum McGregor says the next Celtic manager will have the full backing of a united dressing room following the departure of Ange Postecoglou.
articles.title: Callum McGregor makes next Celtic manager vow as club captain reacts to Ange Postecoglou exit

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Celtic's search for a new manager has begun following Ange Postecoglou’s departure to Tottenham Hotspur, becoming the Premier League club’s new permanent head coach.
articles.title: Next Celtic manager: 13 frontunners including Manchester City coach, former Rangers star, ex-Chelsea boss

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Celtic’s manager search is underway after Ange Postecoglou was announced as the new Tottenham Hotspur boss on a four-year-deal.
articles.title: Enzo Maresca: Celtic manager candidate, 'invaluable asset' to Pep Guardiola, Robert De Zerbi similarities

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Celtic have said farewell to Ange Postecoglou after conceding defeat in their attempts to keep him following confirmation of his appointment as the new manager of Tottenham Hotspur.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou delivers final parting Celtic words as Spurs chairman Daniel Levy hails appointment

articles.author: Chris Andrews
articles.description: Ange Postecoglou is this week expected to leave Celtic to take up the head coach position at Premier League side Tottenham Hotspur.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou: Celtic aim to land bumper windfall for Spurs move, Rodgers doubts as leading candidate emerges

articles.author: Alan Pattullo
articles.description: Alastair Johnston has targeted Champions League improvement with Celtic as the club enter a period of uncertainty following the departure of manager Ange Postecoglou.
articles.title: "I feel we have to take those next steps" - defender addresses next season's Celtic targets after "whirlwind"

articles.author: Alan Pattullo
articles.description: “When the Celts went up to lift the Scottish Cup, we were there, we were there!” echoed around Hampden during the second half of Saturday’s Scottish Cup final, with Celtic leading 2-0 against Inverness Caledonian Thistle.
articles.title: "When the Celts go up to lift the Scottish Cup..." But they didn't go up. Why not? Further erosion of tradition amid 'health and safety concerns'

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: The planned vote regarding the introduction of a new fifth tier within Scottish football has been scrapped on the eve of the Scottish FA AGM.
articles.title: Celtic, Hearts and Rangers blow as Conference League vote scrapped despite SFA chief's self interest pleas

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: The footballing cycle moves at a bewildering pace these days.
articles.title: Why Ange Postecoglou is the right fit for Tottenham and where his departure leaves Celtic

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Ange Postecoglou has taken a further step towards the Celtic exit door after agreeing terms with Tottenham Hotspur after the Premier League club were granted permission to speak to the Australian.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou 'agrees terms' with Spurs, John Kennedy's Celtic future, Brendan Rodgers return answer

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Scottish clubs will vote on Tuesday whether to back a resolution for the introduction of a Conference League which will consist of four B teams and sit below the SPFL as a new fifth tier.
articles.title: Conference League vote: Celtic, Rangers and Hearts to discover B team future as 40 clubs signal intentions

articles.description: Ange Postecoglou has taken one step closer to leaving Celtic for Tottenham Hotspur after the Premier League club were granted permission to speak to the Australian.

articles.description: Greg Taylor admits he will have little time to dwell on Celtic's historic treble success – or his own upcoming nuptials – ahead of another big month with Scotland.

articles.description: Ange Postecoglou looks set to depart Celtic amid reports that he informed Parkhead bosses of his desire to become the next manager of Tottenham after Saturday's Scottish Cup win over Inverness.

articles.author: Alan Pattullo
articles.description: Pointing out that the key to Scotland’s success against Norway might hinge on keeping Erling Haaland quiet is hardly earth-shattering tactical insight.
articles.title: Steve Clarke discusses strikers, Rory Wilson, Ben Doak - 'it would be nice to get one or two more for Scotland'

articles.author: Moira Gordon
articles.description: Pride comes before a call, with Ange Postecoglou all lined up to have a chat about his future in the coming days. But defender Carl Starfelt said there was no hint of a farewell when he addressed the players after they wrapped up a world-record eighth treble.
articles.title: Celtic players lift lid on Ange Postecoglou post-match address as Hampden hero says: 'Maybe the Gods support me'

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Celtic manager Ange Postecoglou came as close to offering a valedictory address as possible without bursting the bubble of his club’s support in the wake of the 3-1 Scottish Cup triumph over Inverness Caledonian Thistle that delivered the Greek-Australian and his squad a domestic treble, snaring a world record eighth such haul for the Glasgow side.
